newsitem.title: DENMARK: Danish shares seen following Dow to hit new peaks.
newsitem.headline: Danish shares seen following Dow to hit new peaks.

text.p: Danish share prices climbed in early trade on Friday inspired by the record Dow close with dealers expecting the top-20 KFX index to finish the week at a new record high for the fourth consecutive day.
"There can be no doubt about the index hitting a new record, I see the KFX closing 1.50 to two points up after yesterday's records here and in New York," one dealer said.
The KFX top-20 index had gained 1.03 point or 0.59 percent to 176.68 at 0740 GMT, after closing 0.07 point higher on Thursday.
